EmailTemplate.description: Email template used when notifying the SAAM case owner that the Financial Assessment Compliance has been updated.
EmailTemplate.name: IFAP SAAM Compliance update
EmailTemplate.subject: IFAP - SAAM case Financial Assessment Compliance update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFullName},
The related IFAP Case has been updated for your SAAM Case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Best Regards, IFAP Team
